featured.text: The entire island of Kizhi is, 18 , an outdoor museum of wooden architecture created in 1966.

definition.zh_def: 一種傳統的印度草藥療法，通常使用草藥和熱石來進行身體療法。
definition.en_def: A traditional Indian herbal therapy that typically involves the use of herbs and heated leaves for body treatment.
definition.example: Kizhi is often used to relieve muscle pain and improve circulation.
